title: Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site: Publications
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Publications            Publications       Brochures Brochures are available at the Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site or at the Independence Visitor Center on the day of your visit.  Unfortunately, the park cannot accommodate quantity requests for brochures.   Send mail requests to: Independence National Historical Park 143 South Third Street Philadelphia, PA 19106    Request by email  Â    Additional Resources  "Defamation of Poe's Character"  "Poe's Death"  "Science Fiction Pioneer"  "Poe Invents the Modern Detective Story"
